Bash(venv/bin/python3 -c "
import sys
import importlib

# Simulate what app.py does when testing a submission
module_id = 11
tester_module_name = f''module{module_id:03d}_tester''

try:
    tester_module = importlib.import_module(tester_module_name)
    test_result = tester_module.test_submission(''/tmp/test_rollercoaster.py'')
    
    print(f''✅ Tester module imported successfully: {tester_module_name}'')
    print(f''✅ Test passed: {test_result[""passed""]}'')
    print(f''✅ Score: {test_result[""score""]}'')
    print(f''✅ Message: {test_result[""message""]}'')
    print(f''✅ Number of tests: {len(test_result[""tests""])}'')
except ModuleNotFoundError as e:
    print(f''❌ Module not found: {e}'')
except Exception as e:
    print(f''❌ Error: {e}'')
")
